Issue.summary: Packaging Go chaincode errors if trying to package outside GOPATH
Issue.description: The packager for Go chaincode assumes that I am using the old style of Go where I write all my code within my GOPATH (not that it should anyway since it doesn't try to build on the local machine just takes the files). Newer Go projects are written using Go Modules meaning it is no longer necessary for the Go to be written within a Go path to be valid. It should therefore be able to handle this new style and allow me to package my Go project outside my GOPATH.
